# Introduction

This book compiles the information acquired at the PhD course on R for environmental chemistry data analysis. The aim of this course is to learn how use use R studio and be able to treat and visualize environmental data. 


The first chapters of this book includes the basic knowledge needed to understand how to program in R studio. In the next sections how to plot the data is compiled, for instance, how to use *Tidyverse* and how to create interactive plots are described. In the next part of this book how to perform statistic test in R studio will be discussed, and finally, how to interact with *ChatGPT* is included.
